snippet.title: The Experiment (aka. eXperience 112) trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer of the Adventure game 'The Experiment'(aka. eXperience 112), developed by Lexis Numérique.

"A dilapidated ship. A fully functioning control and surveillance system. A woman, Lea Nichols, the only surviving member of a team of scientists. Monitor, control, search and explore. From behind your cameras you try to guide Lea Nichols towards freedom, but above all towards the truth. Be her eyes and ears as you help her accomplish her mission. But beware! Remember, things are not always what they seem..."

Release date: 5th February 2008

as of January 2008, the english version of the game was renamed 'The Experiment'.
